title: Ticket #2683: keep x509UserProxyExpiration up to date
description:
The job attributes x509userproxysubject x509UserProxyExpiration x509UserProxyVOName x509UserProxyFirstFQAN x509UserProxyFQAN are set by condor_submit. They are never updated. If they were, it would be possible to have a policy that holds/removes jobs with expired proxies or other policy based on DNs and VOMS attributes.
